ch0102_00_bell/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh! Hi there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was hoping I’d run into you.
ch0102_00_bell/0101_0701_02_10:
Are you ready to get out there and give it your
all today? Let’s go!
ch0102_00_bell/0601_0701_01_10:
Have I ever told you the story of how I ran into
Team Plasma while traveling across Unova?
ch0102_00_bell/0601_0701_02_10:
They’re bad people who tried to use Pokémon for
their bad deeds... When I met them, they were
kicking a Munna to get its Dream Mist.
ch0102_00_bell/0601_0701_03_10:
I just kind of stood there in shock, unable to do
anything. Thankfully, my friend showed up to
save the day before it was too late.
ch0102_00_bell/0601_0701_04_10:
I hope I’ve grown a little stronger since then.
I mean, I FEEL like I have, thanks to my amazing
partner Pokémon!
ch0102_00_bell/0602_0701_01_10:
Before I came to Pasio, I was working as
Professor Juniper’s assistant in the Unova region.
ch0102_00_bell/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s my dream to become an amazing Pokémon
Professor like her someday!
ch0102_00_bell/0602_0701_03_10:
I’d really love it if you could cheer me on, too!
You know, if you want to! Hehe...
ch0102_00_bell/0603_0701_01_10:
My childhood friends and I took our first steps
toward becoming Pokémon Trainers together way
back when.
ch0102_00_bell/0603_0701_02_10:
Now they’re so strong! You can tell from the
moment you step onto the battlefield with them.
ch0102_00_bell/0603_0701_03_10:
And the bond they have with their partner
Pokémon is seriously amazing! They’re the best!
ch0102_00_bell/0604_0701_01_10:
Being a Pokémon Professor’s assistant is a lot of
fun, but sometimes I wonder if it’s really for me,
you know?
ch0102_00_bell/0604_0701_02_10:
But what I know for sure is that I want to do
whatever I can to help people and Pokémon
become better friends!
ch0102_00_bell/0604_0701_03_10:
Someday, I might even ask you to help me!
Do you think you’d be on board?
ch0102_00_bell/0605_0701_01_10:
Back in Unova, an evil group called Team Plasma
used to steal Pokémon away from their Trainers.
ch0102_00_bell/0605_0701_02_10:
Can you believe that?! I could never forgive
anyone who would tear apart a friendship
like that!
ch0102_00_bell/0605_0701_03_10:
If we ever run into jerks like them again, let’s
stop them together, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0102_00_bell/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it helps you along your adventures!
ch0102_00_bell/2501_0701_01_10:
In the past, I used to compare myself to the
people around me a lot... It kind of made me
feel bad about myself.
ch0102_00_bell/2501_0701_02_10:
I used to envy how strong and determined my
friends were when it came to Pokémon battles.
ch0102_00_bell/2501_0701_03_10:
I relied on my friends a lot—and I mean a LOT!
But as time went on and I gained more
experience, I realized something.
ch0102_00_bell/2501_0701_04_10:
I’m me and they’re them, and that’s OK! We’re all
different and we all have faults, so it’s kind of
silly to compare ourselves to each other.
ch0102_00_bell/2501_0702_01_10:
Learning to accept yourself for who you are is
really important, but don’t forget you’ve got a
Pokémon by your side, too!
ch0102_00_bell/2501_0702_02_10:
Why go it alone when you can learn and grow
together as partners!
ch0102_00_bell/2511_0701_01_10:
How are you feeling, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
If something’s bothering you, you should try
reaching out to someone to talk about it.
ch0102_00_bell/2511_0701_02_10:
I used to overthink things a lot. I worried about
this and that and kept it all bottled up inside
because I didn’t know what else to do.
ch0102_00_bell/2511_0701_03_10:
But during my journey through Unova, I learned
how important it is to rely on others and to be
there for them when they need you, too.
ch0102_00_bell/2511_0701_04_10:
If you ever need an ear to listen, I’m here for
you, OK? Don’t hesitate to reach out if you need
my help!
ch0102_00_bell/2511_0702_01_10:
People and Pokémon are never really alone—
we have each other to rely on when things
get tough!
ch0102_00_bell/2511_0702_02_10:
You’ve come to the rescue for me so many times.
Now it’s my turn to return the favor!
ch0102_00_bell/3001_0701_01_10:
Wow, look at you! I wish I could be that full of
energy in the morning! *giggle*
ch0102_00_bell/3003_0701_01_10:
Oh, hi! Are you hungry right now? I was just
gonna grab a bite to eat!
ch0102_00_bell/3005_0701_01_10:
Hmm... It must be about time for all the nocturnal
Pokémon to wake up, huh?
